pages.text: Dearest reader,$(br2)The volume before you shall be your trusted guide through the mysteries of Theurgy. Before we start our journey, let me introduce the most important terms to you.

pages.title: Theurgy
pages.text: Called "miracle-working" by the uneducated. Referred to in educated circles as Hermeticism, Thaumaturgy or Alchemy, it is the science of the invisible forces that govern our universe.

pages.title: Theurgist
pages.text: Known also as Hermeticist, Thaumaturge, Alchemist. Often seen as a performer of miracles, but simply a person learned in the science of Theurgy.

pages.title: Essentia
pages.text: The indivisible elements $(i)everything$() is made of. Control over essentia equals (almost) total control over matter.

pages.title: Aether
pages.text: The invisible force that drives and controls the universe. It permeates every object and being. An obvious choice as energy source, if one knows how to access it.

pages.title: Resonance
pages.text: The concept, that every object oscillates at a certain frequency. Once the frequency is known, finding alike objects is trivial.
